Entries.Evelyn: I'm glad Gus added a vegetarian option after all. It's not zucchinis, but it's still something.
Entries.Gus: Eat as much as you like! It's all free today... compliments of Mayor Lewis.$h#$e#Oh! Make sure to dribble some of my secret sauce on there. Due to popular request, we also have eggplant steak now. Entirely vegetarians!

Entries.Caroline: Pierre is very serious about his grange display. He's been setting aside the best-looking produce for weeks in preparation. But the competition is high this year.#$e#Hey, best of luck to you if you enter!
Entries.Willy: What will you put in your grange display, @? It's your chance to show off all the good produce from %farm!#$b# I'm pretty proud of my catch this year.$h
Entries.Gus: Eat as much as you like! It's all free today... compliments of Mayor Lewis.$h#$e#Oh! Make sure to dribble some of my secret sauce on there.#$e#Hey, you saw that fish on Willy's stand ? I'm so impatient to cook it. What a feast it will be.$h
Entries.Elliott: I want to hear Willy's story about how he caught this fish. I'm sure it was epic.

Entries.Town-Fair.4: Tourist: I never saw a fish so big !

Entries.Event.cs.1591: I expected a better result...$s#$b#Did you saw this fish Willy caught ? I wonder how much this would sell for.
Entries.Event.cs.1597: Lewis may not be into fishing but even he was impressed this year!$h
Entries.Event.cs.1606: This fish was so big I had to ask for help to weigh it!.$h

Entries.Town-Fair.25: This big fish is likely a sturgeon. They can have impressive size.

Entries.Caroline: It's nice to see some new things each year.#$e#Hey, best of luck to you if you enter!
Entries.Willy: Are you ready for this year, @?#$b#Today I wanted to show off the best treasures of the sea.$h
Entries.Elliott: I like imagining stories for each item on Willy's stand. How did this chest end up in the sea??

Entries.Town-Fair.4: Tourist: These treasures are so shiny.
Entries.Town-Fair.5: Tourist: This year the grange displays are amazing! Did you see all of those beautiful pearls?

Entries.Event.cs.1591: I wasn't able to compete with Willy. Maybe I should change things up a bit next time.$s
Entries.Event.cs.1597: All of this was very rewarding.$h
Entries.Event.cs.1606: The sea can be generous in a lot of ways. Maybe Lewis will be too.$h

Entries.Town-Fair.25: Those are amongst the finest pearls.

Entries.Marnie: This year our hens laid some blue eggs. Those are pretty rare, you know?$h#$e#Shane did an amazing job.$h
Entries.Shane: All these animals are friendly and love to get massaged.#$b#Hey, did you see the hens' work on Marnie's stand ? I'm so proud.$h
Entries.Shane_spouse: All these animals are friendly and love to get massaged.#$b#How is your grange display ? Did you see the hens' work on Marnie's stand ? I'm so proud.$h
Entries.Jas: Ow! A hen pecked my little finger!$u#$b#I prefer blue hens. They are prettier, and this year we even got blue eggs.$h

Entries.Town-Fair.4: Tourist: Oh, look at these eggs. What a pretty color!

Entries.Event.cs.1591: I'm disappointed, but I must admit Marnie did an amazing job this year.$s
Entries.Event.cs.1595: I'm happy I was able to show off our work on the farm. I'm very proud of our hens!

Entries.Town-Fair.13: Tourist: I wonder, would the chickens be blue too ?
Entries.Town-Fair.24: The blue eggs have little spots on them.

Entries.Caroline: I'm so happy to have the opportunity to show my plants!#$e#Hey, best of luck to you if you enter!
Entries.Evelyn: I'm glad to see Caroline having a stand this year.#$e#Some of her flowers are coming from seeds i gave her, it's such a pleasure to see them.
Entries.Jodi: Well, this clown isn't very funny... I'll rather return seeing Caroline's stand.#$e#I wonder if i can have a cutting of one of these beautiful flowers.
Entries.Pierre: This year, Caroline made this amazing display.

Entries.Town-Fair.5: Simon: Mom, look at the flowers. They are so pretty.

Entries.Event.cs.1591: It was a great experience, i'm glad Caroline convinced me.
Entries.Event.cs.1593: It's a bit disappointing for Caroline, but she is still happy.#$e#We'll retry this for sure.

Entries.Town-Fair.23: Caroline has wonderful flowers coming from her sunroom.

Entries.Clint: This is my collection of geodes. They contain a lot of things, some very precious.#$b#I can open them of course, but i like keeping a bit of mystery.#$b#Remember, i can open geodes for you.
Entries.Marlon: Extracting the content of geodes without breaking it isn't easy, i can tell you.

Entries.Town-Fair.34: Clint is displaying high-quality bronze, iron, and gold bars. He also has some geodes to show!

Entries.Clint: I make sharp weapons, but as you see, i can also make delicate pieces.
Entries.Marlon: Clint's talent is precious.#$e#We wouldn't be able to protect the valley without it.
Entries.Robin: I need solid tools for carving wood. Clint is providing high quality equipment.#$e#One of these iridium tools would be useful, but i can't afford them yet.

Entries.Town-Fair.34: Clint is displaying high-quality bronze, iron, and gold bars. There's also some fine rings, a sharp sword, and an amazing iridium axe!
